data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This is flexible WWW portal CGI(S) based. All elements are plugins
    (even menu). Skins are supported too. At this moment there aren't
    module, which has similar (similar project was ePortal by Sergey
    Rusakov, but has less functionality and is probably abadoned).
    Adding any messages, plugins or any elements are very simple so
    resonable name is CMS (Common Message System). I've already try to
    register namespace, but there wasn't any answer at all.

    Ps. PHP support will be added in the next version (it is made by
    'serialize()' function from php). Sorry, for my English.
